translation.en: All right, it's the last day of school. We got five minutes to go over
translation.ja: 学年末だ ５分で アメリカ史をまとめよう

translation.en: all of American history.
translation.ja: ５分で アメリカ史をまとめよう

translation.en: Wiped out the indigenous people, oppressed the blacks,
translation.ja: 先住民を追い出して 黒人を抑圧

translation.en: did some good stuff around World War II, and now the sun is setting on our empire.
translation.ja: 第２次大戦でいいことして 今は安泰

translation.en: Yeah, I guess we did cover it all.
translation.ja: 総括できたな

translation.en: Yeah, and even some stuff that didn't happen.
translation.ja: ウソの歴史もある 月面着陸さ

translation.en: Like... landing on the moon.  Come on!
translation.ja: ウソの歴史もある 月面着陸さ 勘弁して

translation.en: I really gotta get you off Reddit, Lorenzo.
translation.ja: ネットの見過ぎだ

translation.en: All right, I see everybody gazing, looking out the window, ready to go full Braveheart on everyone.
translation.ja: 窓に注目して 「ブレイブハート」をやる

translation.en: They might take our lives, but they'll never take our freedom!
translation.ja: “俺たちの命は奪えても 俺たちの自由は奪えない”

translation.en: Sorry, Ms. Thompson! I didn't mean to scare you!
translation.ja: トンプソン先生 脅かしてごめん

translation.en: Oh, that's not gonna end well.
translation.ja: 気まずいな

translation.en: Of course, England did take Scotland's freedom, and they've had it for over 700 years.
translation.ja: 英国はスコットランドの 自由を700年以上 奪った

translation.en: Don't tell Mel Gibson.
translation.ja: メルには言うな

translation.en: Wait, Mel Gibson lost?
translation.ja: メルは負けた？

translation.en: Yeah, it was kind of the beginning of a long losing streak for him.
translation.ja: 彼の連敗記録の始まりだ

translation.en: All right, bonus points. What did America have that Scotland didn't have,
translation.ja: ではアメリカにあって スコットランドにないのは？

translation.en: besides men who wear pants?
translation.ja: 下着をはく男以外で

translation.en: This is coming from a guy wearing shorts.
translation.ja: 半ズボンの男からの質問

translation.en: I got this. Weapons.
translation.ja: 分かった　武器だ

translation.en: Seriously, Walt? You-- You think the Scots got to the battlefield and were like,
translation.ja: じゃあ戦場にいる スコットランド人はこうか

translation.en: Hey, Angus, is there something we're forgetting?
translation.ja: “何か忘れてないか？”

translation.en: Oh, no, I got my charger and my Bluetooth speakers.
translation.ja: “充電器もスピーカーも あるよ”

translation.en: What're we forgetting?
translation.ja: “何か忘れてる？”

translation.en: Weapons!
translation.ja: “武器だ！”

translation.en: America was basically a castle with a 3,000- mile moat. It's called the Atlantic Ocean.
translation.ja: アメリカには5000キロの お堀があった　大西洋よ

translation.en: Ding, ding, ding, ding, ding! Marisol is right once again!
translation.ja: マリソルが正解だ

translation.en: Oh! You're always right. You're worse than my ex.
translation.ja: 俺の元妻みたいに正しすぎる

translation.en: - - All right, look, you guys.
translation.ja: 地図を

translation.en: It took the British two months to sail food all the way across to here, all right?
translation.ja: 英国人が食料を船で運ぶには ２か月かかった

translation.en: They could've just called Domino's.
translation.ja: 宅配ピザを呼べただろ

translation.en: Ooh! I'll split a Meatlovers.
translation.ja: 肉多めが好き

translation.en: My man.
translation.ja: いいね

translation.en: Okay, lightning round. Who remembers the Monroe Doctrine?
translation.ja: 次の質問　モンロー主義を 覚えてる者は？

translation.en: Anyone else?
translation.ja: 他の者

translation.en: Go ahead.
translation.ja: 言って

translation.en: In 1823, James Monroe declared any intervention by external powers in the politics of the Americas a hostile act.
translation.ja: 1872年にモンローが外部との 相互不干渉を提唱したこと

translation.en: So smart.
translation.ja: 賢いね

translation.en: Yeah, Mikey, real smart.
translation.ja: 確かに賢いよな

translation.en: Okay, now, while Monroe is best remembered for his doctrine,
translation.ja: モンロー主義によって 知られているが―

translation.en: I think he really should be remembered as the first president with enough courage to say,
translation.ja: 勇気を持ってこう言った 初めての大統領でもある

translation.en: Enough with the powdered wigs.
translation.ja: “カツラは勘弁”

translation.en: I mean, seriously. Aside from RuPaul, who thought this was a good look?
translation.ja: ドラァグクイーンしか 着けない

translation.en: Our country was founded by a bunch of dudes who woke up every morning asking their wives,
translation.ja: アメリカを建国した連中は 毎朝 妻に聞いてた

translation.en: M'lady, have you seen my wig?
translation.ja: “私のカツラを見たか？”

translation.en: I-- I can't seem to find-- And my powder, I cannot find my powder!
translation.ja: “カツラが 見つからないんだよ”

translation.en: Where is my powder?
translation.ja: “カツラはどこだ”

translation.en: Anyway, we went 200 years without such a bizarre hairstyle again.
translation.ja: その後200年間は 変な髪形はなし

translation.en: Until now.
translation.ja: 今までは！

translation.en: We went from powdered wigs to one wig dipped in Cheeto dust.
translation.ja: 現大統領のカツラは チートス色

translation.en: At ease, y'all.
translation.ja: 楽にして

translation.en: Oh, hey.
translation.ja: やあ

translation.en: Mr. Iglesias is the cool teacher. Why can't I be the cool principal, hmm?
translation.ja: 彼がクールな教師なら 私はクールな校長よね？

translation.en: - That's not a real question! - Oh!
translation.ja: 質問じゃない

translation.en: Hold on! Hold on!
translation.ja: 待って

translation.en: Before you run off and ghost ride your whips, play dominoes on your stoop, drink your sizzurp...
translation.ja: 車を無人走行させて遊び 風邪薬でラリる前に…

translation.en: What is this old beat talking about?
translation.ja: あいつ 何言ってる？

translation.en: I want you to tell me something you learned this year.
translation.ja: 学んだことを発表して

translation.en: Grace, you wanna make me look good in front of Principal Madison?
translation.ja: グレース 俺の顔を立ててくれ

translation.en: Grace talks in front of people now? I thought she had social anxiety.
translation.ja: 彼女には社会不安障害が あるはず

translation.en: Uh, she does, but she learned how to talk using the computer.  She's still a little shy, though.
translation.ja: 内気だけどパソコンを 使えば話せる

translation.en: I learned that Principal Madison sometimes cries in the parking lot in her Ford Fiesta.
translation.ja: 校長はフォード車の中で 泣いてると学びました

translation.en: Not shy enough.
translation.ja: 内気じゃないわ

translation.en: And for the record, it is a Hyundai Elantra.
translation.ja: 言っとくけど 私の車はヒュンダイ

translation.en: And for the record, Grace's Wi- Fi just went bye- bye.
translation.ja: 言っとくけど ワイファイが切れた

translation.en: Gabe, I will see you in my office at 11:15.
translation.ja: ゲイブ  校長室へ

translation.en: And some of you, I will see next year.
translation.ja: 数名は また来年度に

translation.en: - Hey, wait, what do you mean, some? - We just became sophomores!
translation.ja: “数名”って？ 次は２年生よ

translation.en: Yup! Yup! PE requirements, done!
translation.ja: 必修の体育はなし！

translation.en: Everybody have a good summer! Stay outta trouble!
translation.ja: いい夏休みを 問題を起こすなよ

translation.en: Don't get caught!
translation.ja: 逮捕もダメ

translation.en: Can I talk to you, Mr. Iglesias?
translation.ja: 少し話せますか

translation.en: Being that I'm the only person you speak to out loud, I have to say yes.
translation.ja: 君が唯一 話を できる相手だから聞く

translation.en: I-- I wanted to warn you, Paula's probably a little cranky.
translation.ja: ポーラって 変わってるでしょ

translation.en: She hasn't been getting a lot of pokes on her dating app, if you know what I mean.
translation.ja: デートアプリで 〝いいね〞が来ないのよ

translation.en: I know what you mean, but do you know what you mean?
translation.ja: 自分の話の意味が 分かってる？

translation.en: Grace, we talked about your hacking problem.
translation.ja: ハッキングはよせ

translation.en: How about you? Are you on any dating sites?
translation.ja: 先生は出会い系サイトに 登録を？

translation.en: I, uh-- Just one. It's called, uh, taking time to reflect on my personal mistakes...
translation.ja: 〝個人的な過ちを 振り返るためのサイト〞

translation.en: dot com.
translation.ja: 〝ドット･コム〞

translation.en: Have a good summer!
translation.ja: いい夏休みを

translation.en: Oh, this is sick!
translation.ja: こりゃすごい

translation.en: - 1962 VW Bus. Hippie not included. - Ah!
translation.ja: １９６２年型のバスよ ヒッピーはいないけど

translation.en: You can put it on your dashboard for your summer trip.
translation.ja: 車に飾って

translation.en: Oh, thank you. Dashboard? What do you mean, dashboard? No, I'm putting this in a safety- deposit box.
translation.ja: なぜ車に？ 貸し金庫に入れるよ

translation.en: You know, this is officially the nicest thing I own.
translation.ja: 俺の財産の中で最高級だ

translation.en: God, I hope you're kidding.
translation.ja: 冗談でしょ

translation.en: But you deserve it. Thanks for a great year, Mr. Iglesias.
translation.ja: お世話になりました

translation.en: This is cool!
translation.ja: すげえな

translation.en: Hey, come on, man, let's go!
translation.ja: “さあ 飛ばすぜ”

translation.en: I'm hungry. Well, let's go to Chipotle!
translation.ja: “チポトレ”に寄ろう

translation.en: Hey, you know that's not real Mexican food.
translation.ja: “あれはメキシカンか？”

translation.en: I don't care, I'm high.
translation.ja: “食えりゃいい”

translation.en: - Tony! - Hey, bro.
translation.ja: トニー

translation.en: Dude, were you just stealing out of the basket?
translation.ja: カネを盗もうと？

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: いや

translation.en: Come on, man. This is the GoFundMe for Mr. Hayward's new hip.
translation.ja: ヘイワード先生への 寄付金だぞ

translation.en: I had another bad year at the track.
translation.ja: 賭けでツキがなくてな

translation.en: Oh, big surprise. You know who doesn't have a bad year at the track? The track.
translation.ja: 賭けでツイてるヤツなんて いるのか？

translation.en: Well, you know what they say about gambling. Just keep trying.
translation.ja: “継続は力なり”というだろ

translation.en: Eh, sounds like your dating life.
translation.ja: 恋愛も同じだ

translation.en: Yeah, well, anyway, my losing streak... means I gotta teach summer school.
translation.ja: 散財した分を サマースクールで稼がないと

translation.en: That freakin' sucks, man. I wish you could go with me on this road trip.
translation.ja: ドライブ旅行へ 行きたかったのに

translation.en: Yeah, man, it'd be like Thelma & Luis.
translation.ja: 「テルマ＆ルイーズ」だな

translation.en: Ah, there she is. Rookie of the year.
translation.ja: 今年で一番の新任教師だ

translation.en: Oh, I don't know about that.
translation.ja: そうなの？

translation.en: Come on, Abby, you're the only new teacher this year. If you don't win, that's just sad.
translation.ja: 新任は君だけだぞ 一番でなきゃ悲しいだろ

translation.en: But I can be the strong- but- tender shoulder for you to cry on.
translation.ja: 泣く時は肩を貸すよ

translation.en: Ooh! Now I really wanna win.
translation.ja: 一番を取らなきゃ

translation.en: So, are you excited for your road trip, Gabe?
translation.ja: 旅行は楽しみ？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: My bus is all gassed up, got my '90s Spotify playlist ready with a lot of R&B.
translation.ja: ガソリンは満タン 1990年代の音楽も準備した

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: 任せとけ

translation.en: You guys are adorable.
translation.ja: ２人ともステキ

translation.en: You know who's gonna love you? My fiancé.
translation.ja: フィアンセが好きなタイプよ

translation.en: Ah, fiancé, man. Yeah, that's French for don't put your fry in her ketchup.
translation.ja: フランス語だ　意味は “俺の女に手を出すな”

translation.en: - Abby? Nobody's told you? - Hmm? What?
translation.ja: アビー  知ってる？

translation.en: No relationship survives moving to California.
translation.ja: 遠距離恋愛は続かない

translation.en: No. You gotta find that special someone...
translation.ja: 特別な相手を探し直して

translation.en: - here. - Oh.
translation.ja: ここにいる

translation.en: I hate to agree with him on this one, but yeah.
translation.ja: 不本意だけど同感だ

translation.en: You know those things you found charming back in South Dakota?
translation.ja: サウスダコタでは よく見えても―

translation.en: Ah, they just won't measure up here - in the big leagues. - Uh- uh.
translation.ja: 一流の男にはかなわない

translation.en: Oh! So, you two are the big leagues?
translation.ja: あなたたちが一流？

translation.en: Yup.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: - Us and Ryan Gosling. -
translation.ja: ライアン･ゴズリングも

translation.en: Hey, Mr. Hayward!
translation.ja: ヘイワード先生

translation.en: Gabriel. When are you going to start calling me Ray?
translation.ja: ゲイブ　“レイ”と呼べ

translation.en: What would've happened if we called you Ray
translation.ja: 担任だった昔に そう呼んだら？

translation.en: - when you were our teacher? - I would've whipped your asses.
translation.ja: 担任だった昔に そう呼んだら？ ムチで打ってた

translation.en: Hey! Hey, who's been dipping in my hip money?
translation.ja: 誰が寄付金に手をつけた？

translation.en: You know, my grandmother had a hip replacement.
translation.ja: 祖母も同じ装具を

translation.en: Yeah? How's she doing?
translation.ja: その後は？

translation.en: Oh, she only used it for a month, so... we got most of our money back.
translation.ja: １か月で不要になったから 返金された

translation.en: Hey, you got another year left in you, Mr. Hayward?
translation.ja: あと１年で退職だね

translation.en: The only way I can get out of here without a goddamn party in my honor  is on a gurney with a sheet over my head.
translation.ja: 退職のお祝いを避けるには 担架で運ばれるしかないな

translation.en: - Great, have a nice summer! - Yeah, yeah.
translation.ja: いい夏休みを ああ

translation.en: Don't look at me, boo.
translation.ja: 俺を見るな

translation.en: I gotta get a date.
translation.ja: デートしたいわ　ご兄弟は？

translation.en: - Do you have any brothers? - Two. But they're married.
translation.ja: デートしたいわ　ご兄弟は？ ２人　結婚してます

translation.en: Not to each other, that would be weird.
translation.ja: 兄弟同士の結婚では…

translation.en: Well, marriage is not necessarily a deal- breaker.
translation.ja: 既婚でも問題ないわ

translation.en: Sneaking around can be an aphrodisiac.
translation.ja: 密会って盛り上がるもの

translation.en: So is honest communication with your partner.
translation.ja: 伴侶とも盛り上がれる

translation.en: Ah, the history department. Ms. Spencer, an outstanding teacher.
translation.ja: 歴史科の先生方か 優秀なスペンサー先生

translation.en: Gabe and Tony, also teachers.
translation.ja: ゲイブとトニーは並

translation.en: Now, if you'll excuse me, I have some letters to deliver.
translation.ja: 手紙を配るので失礼

translation.en: You'd fit right in as a mailman. Dogs already don't like you.
translation.ja: 配達員が似合いだ 犬は嫌うけどね

translation.en: Captain Tennille, my Bichon Frise, would beg to differ.
translation.ja: 飼ってるマルチーズは違うよ

translation.en: Did you rescue him?
translation.ja: 捨て犬を助けた？

translation.en: No, he rescued me.
translation.ja: 私が助けられた

translation.en: So, Helen Stone is taking early retirement this year, and one of you will be getting her honor students section this fall.
translation.ja: ストーン先生が退職するので 誰かを上級クラス担当に

translation.en: I'll do it. I can have a syllabus ready by the end of lunch.
translation.ja: やります　すぐシラバスを

translation.en: And Gabe drives a silly- bus.
translation.ja: ゲイブはバスでドライブへ

translation.en: Well, I guess that eliminates Tony.
translation.ja: トニーは候補失格

translation.en: Not yet.
translation.ja: まだよ

translation.en: All three of you take your lunch hour and come up with a mission statement  as to why I should pick you,
translation.ja: ３人とも昼休みに 所信表明を書いて

translation.en: and I'll make my decision at the end of the day.
translation.ja: それを見て決める

translation.en: You know what I like doing on my lunch hour? Lunch.
translation.ja: 昼休みはランチの時間ですよ

translation.en: We all know you're gonna go with Abby to teach the honor students.
translation.ja: どうせ選ばれるのはアビーだ

translation.en: Well, I like to think that all of our students are honors students.
translation.ja: でも うちの生徒は 皆 優秀と思ってます

translation.en: And I'd like to think Idris Elba is at home, waiting for me.
translation.ja: なら私の恋人は イドリス･エルバよ

translation.en: Come on, Tony, surprise me. Don't suck so much.
translation.ja: トニー  すねずに挑戦して

translation.en: You know, when a coach picks on you, that means you're the star player.
translation.ja: いびられるのも期待の証しだ

translation.en: Hmm. Sometimes, it just means you're bad.
translation.ja: 使えないだけかも

translation.en: Come on, Paula. We both know you should go with me. No one teaches history like I do.
translation.ja: ポーラ  歴史教師としては 俺が一番ですよ

translation.en: I know. You're good.  That's why I let you slide with the dress code.
translation.ja: そうね だからその服でも許してる

translation.en: What? You can't hide these calves from the rest of the world.
translation.ja: なんで？　俺のふくらはぎは 天下一品です

translation.en: Oh, that hurt.
translation.ja: 筋を痛めた

translation.en: You got your assignment, Gabe. I'll see you after lunch.
translation.ja: とにかく所信表明を書いて

translation.en: I can't get my leg off.
translation.ja: 下ろせない

translation.en: You okay? You need some alone time in your Elantra?
translation.ja: 大丈夫？ 車で１人になりますか？

translation.en: My kid is graduating from middle school next week, and my ex- husband, the first one, is going to be there.
translation.ja: 私の子の卒業式に １番目の元夫が来るの

translation.en: You meet the love of your life at Freaknik, and you think it's gonna last.
translation.ja: 一生 添い遂げる 予定だった人？

translation.en: Gabe, he's bringing his young wife.
translation.ja: 若妻を連れてくるの

translation.en: I've been looking for a guy all year, but apparently,  I'm giving Southern California carpal tunnel from swiping left.
translation.ja: 私はデートアプリを スワイプしまくって腱鞘炎(けんしょうえん)に

translation.en: You still got it. You're smart, you're pretty, you're strong.
translation.ja: でも校長は頭がよくて 美人だし―

translation.en: You're an amazing administrator.
translation.ja: 優秀な管理職だ

translation.en: Is this all a part of your mission statement?
translation.ja: それも所信表明？

translation.en: If it's working, then yes.
translation.ja: そういうことに

translation.en: Mr. Iglesias!
translation.ja: イグレシアス先生

translation.en: - Oh, hey, Walt. - Great news.
translation.ja: ウォルター 僕は早期卒業に

translation.en: I'm graduating early.
translation.ja: 僕は早期卒業に

translation.en: Graduating? What're you talking about?
translation.ja: 何を言ってる

translation.en: Check it out, I got a letter from Mr. Hernandez.
translation.ja: 副校長から手紙が来た

translation.en: Counseled... out.
translation.ja: “出ることを勧めます”

translation.en: Walt, you're not graduating, you're-- you're being expelled.
translation.ja: こりゃ退学処分だぞ

translation.en: Well, I think we can agree,  the important thing is, I don't have to come back!
translation.ja: 戻らなくていいなら賛成だ

translation.en: School didn't want me, and I've never wanted it.  This is a no- fault divorce. Just like my folks.
translation.ja: 互いに納得して別れる 僕の両親と同じだ

translation.en: So, what next? Goldman Sachs?
translation.ja: やめて証券会社へ？

translation.en: Foot Locker. I'll make those stripes look good.
translation.ja: 人気の靴店で 縦縞(たてじま)の制服を着る

translation.en: Yeah, I doubt that. I used to work there. Heh. I looked like a fat barcode.
translation.ja: 俺も働いてたが 太ったバーコードに

translation.en: I think you can do better than Foot Locker.
translation.ja: もっといい仕事が

translation.en: You know what I'd really like to sell?
translation.ja: 実は売りたいんです

translation.en: Did the state of California legalize it in 2016?
translation.ja: 2016年に合法化されたもの？

translation.en: I was gonna say custom rims, but I like your idea way better. Thanks, Mr. Iglesias!
translation.ja: 車のリムだったけど 先生の案のほうがいいね

translation.en: Uh, wait, no-- Uh-- You know, I was thinking shoe--
translation.ja: 待てよ　人に必要なのは靴だ

translation.en: - People need shoes! - Not as much as they need weed!
translation.ja: 待てよ　人に必要なのは靴だ クサも必要だ

translation.en: Yeah, but they need the shoes to get to the weed!
translation.ja: クサを買うには靴が要る

translation.en: Hey, Tony. Any of your students get this weird letter?
translation.ja: 君の生徒にも変な手紙が？

translation.en: Maybe. We're not that close.
translation.ja: さあ　親しくないんだ

translation.en: Hey, can you help me with my mission statement?
translation.ja: 手伝ってくれよ

translation.en: Sure. I can't believe I'm still doing your homework.
translation.ja: いまだに宿題の手伝いとは

translation.en: Just get me started.
translation.ja: 書き方を教えろ

translation.en: All right. Uh... Why do you wanna teach the honors program?
translation.ja: なぜ上級クラスで 教えたいと？

translation.en: Because it'd be way easier.
translation.ja: 楽だから

translation.en: Lead with that.
translation.ja: そう書け

translation.en: You know, Tony, have you ever had a student who was afraid to try?
translation.ja: 挑戦を恐れる生徒はいたか？

translation.en: Yeah, that's half my kids.
translation.ja: クラスの半分だ

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: And they worry that if they try their hardest then fail, they can't ever use the excuse that they weren't really trying?
translation.ja: 失敗したら “本気じゃ なかった”と言い訳を？

translation.en: Yeah, I see it all the time.
translation.ja: みんな そうだ

translation.en: Well, this isn't about my students, this is about...
translation.ja: 生徒の話でなく俺の…

translation.en: Oh! I see what you did there.
translation.ja: そういうことか

translation.en: Gabe? I know we're competing against each other,
translation.ja: ゲイブ 所信表明を見てくれる？

translation.en: - but would you proof my mission statement? - You too?
translation.ja: ゲイブ 所信表明を見てくれる？ 君も？

translation.en: Charts? You got charts?
translation.ja: グラフを入れたの？

translation.en: And a bibliography?
translation.ja: 参考文献も？

translation.en: Yeah. Is it tacky that I cited my own grad school thesis?
translation.ja: 自分の卒論を引用するのは 悪趣味？

translation.en: Yes!
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: - Wait. Is this PowerPoint? - Mm- hmm.
translation.ja: パワーポイントも？

translation.en: You really do speak the language of the honors kids.
translation.ja: 優等生の言葉遣いだ

translation.en: Oh, thank you! I also speak French.
translation.ja: フランス語も話せるわ

translation.en: - What did that mean? - I don't know,
translation.ja: 何て？

translation.en: but I've never been called petite.
translation.ja: 初めて“小さい(プチ)”と言われた

translation.en: Hey, Mikey.
translation.ja: マイキー

translation.en: You got a letter, too?
translation.ja: 手紙が？

translation.en: Ah, it's probably just a bill. At my house, we don't open those till the one after final- final notice.
translation.ja: たぶん請求書だ　うちでは 最終通告のあとで開ける

translation.en: Yeah, I get it. You know, growing up, we were on a first- name basis with our repo man.
translation.ja: 取り立て人には 下の名を教えるもんだ

translation.en: Yeah, Hector the collector even came to my graduation.
translation.ja: 俺は卒業式でも取り立てが

translation.en: - Are you gonna pay that for me? - No, but someone is gonna pay for this.
translation.ja: 立て替えを？ 俺以外の人がな

translation.en: Yo, yo, wait up, wait up! I got more bills!
translation.ja: 他にも請求書があるんだ

translation.en: - We're in a meeting! - Yeah, and I'm in it too. Hi.
translation.ja: 会議中だぞ 俺も交ぜて

translation.en: What do you want, Gabe?
translation.ja: 何の用？

translation.en: What's up with these letters? And what the hell is counseled out?
translation.ja: “出ることを勧める”とは？

translation.en: It's a nice way of saying to our underperforming students,
translation.ja: こう言うよりはマシだろ

translation.en: Dear dumb ass, get lost. Kmart is hiring.
translation.ja: “うせろ　スーパーで働け”

translation.en: Attention Kmart shoppers, pay no attention to the idiot on aisle five.
translation.ja: “お客様  ５番通路の アホにはお構いなく”

translation.en: Gabe, we are a public school.
translation.ja: うちは公立学校よ

translation.en: Our funding depends on meeting certain standards: grades, discipline, attendance levels.
translation.ja: 予算をもらうには 一定の水準を満たさないと

translation.en: And the easiest way to improve those averages is to counsel out the kids who are hurting the numbers.
translation.ja: 全体の成績を上げるには 落第生を追い出すことだ

translation.en: What do you call this program? Some Children Left Behind?
translation.ja: “少しだけ 落ちこぼす運動”ですか？

translation.en: I don't hate it.
translation.ja: いいね

translation.en: This program could make our school the educational pearl of the district.
translation.ja: 本校を輝かせるためなの

translation.en: Yeah. All you gotta do is swipe left on a bunch of kids.
translation.ja: 生徒を “スワイプ”してるだけだ

translation.en: What's swipe left?
translation.ja: スワイプって？

translation.en: The story of my damn life.
translation.ja: 私の人生の話よ

translation.en: - Ah, Mr. Hayward! - Hey!
translation.ja: ヘイワード先生

translation.en: Have you heard about these counseled out letters?
translation.ja: 勧告の手紙の件を？

translation.en: The not our problem anymore letters. Yeah, sure.
translation.ja: “うちの 知ったことじゃない”だろ

translation.en: Always easier to juke the stats than reach the hard cases.
translation.ja: 生徒の指導より 統計をいじるほうが楽だ

translation.en: Something tells me I need to sit down for this.
translation.ja: 座れって意味ですね

translation.en: Gabriel, when I was about your age, I got a job offer at a private school.
translation.ja: 君の年の頃 私立学校に誘われたよ

translation.en: You know, where the students wear cardigans with the crests on them.
translation.ja: 制服にカーディガンがある 学校さ

translation.en: Hogwarts.
translation.ja: ホグワーツだ

translation.en: Then, at lunch, a couple of kids got in a little scrap.
translation.ja: だが ある日 校内でケンカが起きた

translation.en: As I was stopping the fight, one of the kids hit me, and that's when I knew I needed to be here.
translation.ja: 止めようとして生徒に殴られ 自分はここに必要だと思った

translation.en: Hit you so hard it gave you dementia.
translation.ja: 殴られて認知症に？

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: 違う

translation.en: See, I knew what that kid was dealing with at home, and I knew what would've happened if that kid had hit any other teacher.
translation.ja: 問題のある子で 他の教師を 殴ってたら大変だった

translation.en: If you had left, you wouldn't have been here when I was on the ropes.
translation.ja: 先生がいなかったら 俺もヤバかった

translation.en: You were one of the kids that let me know I was doing the right thing.
translation.ja: 君も教えがいがあったさ

translation.en: I wonder where I would've wound up without you, Mr. Hayward.
translation.ja: 先生なしじゃ どうなったか

translation.en: Well, you'd have been in some low- paying job with lots of stress, long hours...
translation.ja: 低賃金 長時間勤務の職で 不満を抱えてただろう

translation.en: Hey, there she is. Always reading something.
translation.ja: いつも何か読んでるな

translation.en: Yeah, my obituary.
translation.ja: 私の死亡記事よ

translation.en: No way. Oh, they've gone too far now. You're not just my best student, you're my favorite student.
translation.ja: やり過ぎだ　君は優秀で 俺のお気に入りだぞ

translation.en: We know you say that to all of us.
translation.ja: 皆に言うのね

translation.en: Yeah, I know, but when I'm talking to you, I'm not lying.
translation.ja: 君の前ではウソはつかない

translation.en: Letter says it's 'cause of attendance. I kinda missed some afternoon classes.
translation.ja: 出席率が低いせいよ 課外授業に出てないの

translation.en: - Like how many? - Like all of them.
translation.ja: 何回？ 全部よ

translation.en: I work to help my family, but I did the assignments.
translation.ja: 家の手伝いがある でも課題はやったわ

translation.en: I'm gonna take this to somebody who can help fix it.
translation.ja: 何とかしてみる

translation.en: Oh, my God, are you gonna have Hernandez jumped?
translation.ja: 副校長を跳び上がらせる気？

translation.en: No, but I like your idea much better.
translation.ja: それもいいな

translation.en: Mm... I can't find any central database for the kids who got the letter.
translation.ja: 手紙をもらった生徒の リストがない

translation.en: If I can't access the list, I can't change it. And believe me, I need to.
translation.ja: データを変えられないと 私も困るの

translation.en: Wait, you too? Well, why did you get a letter?
translation.ja: 君まで？　なぜ手紙が？

translation.en: For doing stuff like this.
translation.ja: ハッキングで

translation.en: That's right. That's...  That's why I called you here.
translation.ja: そのために呼んだもんな

translation.en: I need your help getting Principal Madison in a good mood.
translation.ja: 校長の機嫌を取らないと

translation.en: Just get a pitcher of appletinis in her.
translation.ja: マティーニをあげればいい

translation.en: I don't even wanna know how you know that.
translation.ja: そんなことまで？

translation.en: It's on her profile.
translation.ja: 自己紹介文に―

translation.en: Just get a pitcher of appletinis in me, and let the magic happen.
translation.ja: “私にマティーニを渡せば 魔法が起きる”って

translation.en: You know, Grace,
translation.ja: グレース

translation.en: I want you to know how proud I am of you and how far you've come this year, in case I get fired.
translation.ja: 君を誇りに思うと言っとく クビになるかもしれないから

translation.en: Fired? Why would you get fired? You're the best teacher in the school.
translation.ja: どうして？　最高の先生だわ

translation.en: Which, let's face it, that's a low bar.
translation.ja: 他がひどすぎて

translation.en: You think maybe you can, uh, hack back into Principal Madison's dating profile?
translation.ja: 校長の出会い用 プロフィールにアクセスは？

translation.en: Hmm... Which one do you want?
translation.ja: どれがいい？

translation.en: Uh, Bumble, Tinder, UrbanSwipe.  She's on everything but FarmersOnly.
translation.ja: 農家専用以外の全アプリに 登録してるみたい

translation.en: Oh, wait, she's on that one too.
translation.ja: 農家用にも登録が

translation.en: - Yeah, girl is rocking that cowboy hat! - Huh.
translation.ja: カウボーイまで相手に

translation.en: I'm going with...
translation.ja: 上級には―

translation.en: Gabe!
translation.ja: ゲイブを

translation.en: Mother- flowers!
translation.ja: マジ ムカつく！

translation.en: I mean, uh... Congratulations, Gabe.
translation.ja: いえ　おめでとう

translation.en: I just, you know...
translation.ja: 私はその…

translation.en: Hey, Abby, that is why you should never try your hardest.
translation.ja: 本気の努力はするだけ無駄だ

translation.en: Ooh. Yay, me.
translation.ja: やったね

translation.en: What's the matter, Gabe?  You won! I figured right now you'd be doing your touchdown dance.
translation.ja: あなたが勝ったのよ 踊り出すかと思ったのに

translation.en: You know...
translation.ja: こうよ

translation.en: ♪ A little salsa, a little salsa ♪
translation.ja: リトル･サルサ…

translation.en: You know, like a dab or two?
translation.ja: こんなのとか

translation.en: Come on. Do your thing.
translation.ja: ほら　喜んでよ

translation.en: You know, I've been thinking...
translation.ja: 考えてたんです

translation.en: instead of giving me the teach- approved kids,
translation.ja: 優等生クラスでなく―

translation.en: I don't know, why don't you give me the kids that got the counseled out letter from Hernandez?
translation.ja: 副校長から手紙が来た生徒を 任せてもらえませんか

translation.en: You know, the world's worst pen pal?
translation.ja: 最悪の差出人だ

translation.en: Okay...
translation.ja: まあ

translation.en: Carlos, can you come in here a sec?
translation.ja: カルロス  来て

translation.en: Locust, boils, darkness... Hernandez!
translation.ja: この世の災厄の象徴 ヘルナンデス副校長だ

translation.en: Hey! We're just talking about you.
translation.ja: “噂(うわさ)をすれば”だ

translation.en: Carlos, Gabe has volunteered to teach the kids we've counseled out.
translation.ja: 退学勧告した生徒を 教えたいそうよ

translation.en: - Marisol Fuentes is my best student. - Her attendance is unacceptable.
translation.ja: マリソルは優秀なんだ 出席率が悪い

translation.en: She works. She has a real job. You should try it!
translation.ja: 本物の仕事をしてる あんたもやれよ

translation.en: We're just putting every student in a position to succeed.
translation.ja: 全生徒のためを思ってやった

translation.en: Look, so many people have turned their backs on these kids, and I don't want to be one of those people.
translation.ja: 俺だけは 彼らに背を向けたくないんだ

translation.en: We're not turning our backs on them. It's turning our faces to the good students.
translation.ja: 私たちは優等生と 向き合いたいだけだ

translation.en: Look, Hernandez may think that these kids are invisible, but I see them. All of them.
translation.ja: 副校長には見えなくても 俺には彼らが見える

translation.en: It's done.
translation.ja: 諦めろ

translation.en: Hold on, Carlos.
translation.ja: 待って

translation.en: Yeah, hold on, Carlos.
translation.ja: 待ってよ

translation.en: Invisible, you say, Gabe?
translation.ja: 見えない存在と？

translation.en: Did I?
translation.ja: 俺が？

translation.en: You know... a woman gets to a certain age, and she sure knows what that feels like.
translation.ja: 女は ある年齢になると その言葉の意味を痛感する

translation.en: People of color know what that feels like.
translation.ja: 肌の色が違う人たちもよ

translation.en: - Preach, sister. - Shut up, Carlos.
translation.ja: 導きを 黙ってて

translation.en: You know, it's the damnedest thing.
translation.ja: 少し前に―

translation.en: I got a message on my dating app a little while ago from this fine- looking, young Denzel- type who wants to buy me an appletini.
translation.ja: デンゼル似の男性から “マティーニをおごる”と

translation.en: Denzel? Is that even your type?
translation.ja: タイプの男ですか

translation.en: I'm alive, aren't I? Mm...
translation.ja: 生きてるって感じ

translation.en: He even quoted Invisible Man. That's my favorite novel.
translation.ja: 「見えない人間」から引用も

translation.en: You know, I've been meaning to read it.
translation.ja: 読もうと思ってた

translation.en: I am invisible simply because people refuse to see me.
translation.ja: “人が見ようとしないから 自分は見えないのだ”

translation.en: Wow, sounds like a real catch.
translation.ja: つかみはオーケー

translation.en: And then, you come in here, and you refer to these kids as invisible.
translation.ja: 偶然にもあなたも― 生徒を 見えない存在と表現した

translation.en: That's quite a coincidence.
translation.ja: 生徒を 見えない存在と表現した

translation.en: Or maybe it's a sign.
translation.ja: 何かの啓示かも

translation.en: You know, if we don't see these kids now, no one ever will.
translation.ja: 俺たちが見放せば 彼らは終わりだ

translation.en: All right, Gabriel. You got this summer to turn 'em around.
translation.ja: 夏中に 生徒たちを 立ち直らせて

translation.en: Grades, discipline, attendance. No screw- ups.
translation.ja: 成績に素行 出席率も 改善させるの

translation.en: So, Gabe has to waste his summer teaching the drip tray,  and then I get to kick them out. I can live with that.
translation.ja: ゲイブは休みを無駄にして 生徒は落第か　ならいい

translation.en: Well, you live with yourself.
translation.ja: ツラの皮が厚いな

translation.en: You can live with anything.
translation.ja: 好きに生きてけ

translation.en: We can't save them all, Gabe.
translation.ja: 全員は救えないわ

translation.en: I know, but who are we if we don't even try?
translation.ja: やってみないと

translation.en: He is fine!
translation.ja: 彼ってステキ

translation.en: Wait a second, this is Denzel.
translation.ja: デンゼル本人の画像？

translation.en: This is a picture from The Pelican Brief. Somebody photoshopped a cowboy hat on his damn head. Gabe!
translation.ja: カウボーイハットを 彼の画像にかぶせただけだわ

translation.en: Okay. Some of you are here because of your poor grades,
translation.ja: 成績が悪くて ここへ 入れられた者もいるし―

translation.en: poor attendance, disciplinary reasons, or all of the above.
translation.ja: 出席率や素行が 問題の者たちもいる

translation.en: Messed around and got a triple- double.
translation.ja: トリプルダブル達成だ

translation.en: Yup.  I gotta say, it was a good day.
translation.ja: そいつはよかったな

translation.en: All right, so I got some good news, and I have some bad news.
translation.ja: いい知らせと 悪い知らせがある

translation.en: The good news is no one is getting counseled out.
translation.ja: いい知らせは 退学処分なし

translation.en: Yeah, the bad news is... we're gonna have to do summer school.
translation.ja: 悪い知らせはサマースクール

translation.en: Wait, those are both bad things!
translation.ja: 両方 悪い知らせだ

translation.en: I don't know, now I've got something to do this summer.
translation.ja: 夏の予定ができてうれしい

translation.en: Yeah, I got something to do this summer too, and it's not school.
translation.ja: 俺には予定があったのにさ

translation.en: Yay, Mr. Iglesias saved the day!
translation.ja: “イグレシアス先生の お手柄だ”

translation.en: We love him and his hat!
translation.ja: “先生 大好き！”

translation.en: - - What about your trip?
translation.ja: 旅行は？

translation.en: Who wants to roll around in a cool Volkswagen bus, listening to '90s jams and going to wrestling events?
translation.ja: 1990年代の音楽を聴きながら ドライブしたいヤツがいる？

translation.en: I'm gonna guess you?
translation.ja: 先生でしょ

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: 当たり

translation.en: Maybe I didn't think this through.
translation.ja: ミスッたよ

translation.en: Whoo! Rookie of the Year!
translation.ja: 今年のルーキーに

translation.en: - - That's right.
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: As it turns out, it's a real award.
translation.ja: 見てのとおり本物

translation.en: It's got your name engraved on it and everything.
translation.ja: 名前が彫ってある

translation.en: - Aw! You guys are the best! - Mm- hmm.
translation.ja: あなたたちは最高

translation.en: Oh! There's only two Bs in Abby. Heh.
translation.ja: スペルは“Ｂ”が２つよ

translation.en: Bro, you had one job.
translation.ja: マジかよ

translation.en: Ah, thank you. I see you got my text, Katie.
translation.ja: メールを見てくれたのね

translation.en: Your appletini - and your back- up appletini. - Mm- hmm!
translation.ja: マティーニとそのお代わりも

translation.en: How about you, Gabe? The usual, ginger ale on the rocks?
translation.ja: ゲイブはジンジャーエール？

translation.en: Yes, can I also have a lime in it? I ain't driving.
translation.ja: ライムも　運転しない

translation.en: Not to pry, Gabe, but is there a specific reason you don't drink?
translation.ja: お酒を飲まないのには 理由が？

translation.en: Well, if we're being honest, I kind of like remembering what I did and who I did it with.
translation.ja: 誰と何をしたか 覚えていたいんだ

translation.en: Well, that's why I drink.  I like to forget what I did and who I did it with.
translation.ja: 俺は逆で 誰と何をしたかを 忘れたい

translation.en: Don't worry.  Eventually, you'll forget it all.
translation.ja: 年を取れば 全て忘れるさ

translation.en: Only the grinding hip pain will remain.
translation.ja: 股の痛みだけが残る

translation.en: Bone on bone.
translation.ja: 骨のぶつかる痛みが

translation.en: Hey. Here's to the future, huh?
translation.ja: 未来に乾杯

translation.en: - Whoo! Bone on bone. - Mm!
translation.ja: 骨に乾杯

translation.en: All right, Paula. - Who is the new honors teacher? - Oh!
translation.ja: それで上級クラスの担当は？

translation.en: I'm going to go with...
translation.ja: 新しい担当は―

translation.en: you, Tony!
translation.ja: トニーよ

translation.en: Oh, suck a dictionary!
translation.ja: マジ クソ最低！

translation.en: You know, somebody better teach this young gal how to swear,  or she's gonna get laughed out of Long Beach.
translation.ja: 悪態のつき方を教えないと 彼女は笑い物になるぞ

translation.en: I'm sorry, I'm just not a very good loser.  - No practice. - Mm- hmm.
translation.ja: 負けるのが苦手なの 慣れてなくて

translation.en: Abby, you can bring the kids up to your level.
translation.ja: あなたは 生徒を伸ばせるけど―

translation.en: I'm hoping the honors kids can bring Tony up to their level.
translation.ja: 私は生徒にトニーを 伸ばしてほしい

translation.en: Well, thank you, Paula.
translation.ja: お心遣いをどうも

translation.en: So, what kind of raise are we talking about here?
translation.ja: それで昇給の話は？

translation.en: I'm not gonna fire you.
translation.ja: クビにはしない

translation.en: - I do it for the kids. - Mm- hmm!
translation.ja: 生徒のためにも

translation.en: To surviving another school year!
translation.ja: 新年度も乗り切るわよ

translation.en: ♪ The only one, my everything And to you, this song I sing ♪
translation.ja: １時間後
